title: Add loading states, error boundaries
description: Improve user experience by adding proper loading states and error boundaries throughout the application. This ensures graceful handling of async operations and runtime errors.
acceptance_criteria: Add loading.tsx files for all route segments
Implement skeleton loaders for dashboard cards
Implement skeleton loaders for trace list and details
Add error.tsx error boundaries for all routes
Create reusable ErrorFallback component with retry button
Handle network errors gracefully with user-friendly messages
Add global error boundary at app level
Ensure loading states don't cause layout shift (CLS)
Test error boundaries with simulated failures
implementation_notes: Use Suspense boundaries with loading.tsx for route segments
Error boundaries should log errors to console in dev
Consider toast notifications for transient errors
Skeleton dimensions should match actual content
Use CSS animations for skeleton pulse effect
